comic_detail.We hope you have a good time browsing th: We hope you have a good time browsing the comment section!
comic_detail.please_login: Please login to post a comment
comic_detail.will_publish: The chapter will be published to regular users at
comic_detail.will_publish_pre: The chapter will be published to premium users at
comic_detail.error_comment_nor: Normal users can only comment 5 times/day, please refer to the upgrade
comic_detail.error_comment_pre: Premium users can only comment 10 times/day, please refer to the upgrade
comic_detail.policy_1: Comments that spam links or are negative will be deleted, if repeated violations will result in your account being locked
comic_detail.policy_2: Do not discriminate between regions, races, or attack other people's relatives
comic_detail.policy_3: Any comments that sabotage the government or violate ethics will be handled

logins.policy: By continuing, you agree to Fast Scans Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
logins.is_messenger: Please log in using your device's browser application

footer.info: Fast Scans - Free online comic book store | Good comics. New comics. The website always updates the latest series of unique genres such as fairy tales, swordplay, teen stories, and the best love novels and doesn't cost 500 VND.

upgrade.benefit_1: Equipped with vibrant RGB colors for username and related pages
upgrade.benefit_2: Access to a dedicated premium server, more stable than regular users
upgrade.benefit_3: Early access to the latest chapters by 12 hours compared to regular users
upgrade.benefit_4: Receive notifications via email for updates on new chapters of followed comics
upgrade.benefit_5: Increase comment limit to a maximum of 20 times/day
upgrade.benefit_6: Participate in the lucky spin 3 times/day
upgrade.benefit_8: Ability to post/comment on discussion posts on fast-blog
upgrade.benefit_10: Equipped with deep RGB colors for username and related pages
upgrade.benefit_11: Early access to the latest chapters by 4 hours compared to regular users
upgrade.benefit_12: Increase comment limit to a maximum of 10 times/day
upgrade.benefit_13: Participate in the lucky spin 2 times/day
upgrade.benefit_14: Ad tab appearance rate is 2% (compared to 8% for regular users)
upgrade.benefit_15: Ability to comment on discussion posts on fast-blog
upgrade.note_1: When scanning the QR code and completing the transaction, please enter the completed transaction code in the field above and press the send button.
upgrade.note_2: Transactions will be processed within 10 minutes (1:30 to 15:59 every day - Coordinated Universal Time).
upgrade.note_3: If the transaction is outside the above time, it will be processed the next day.
upgrade.note_4: If the transaction is not processed within more than 10 minutes, please contact the fanpage for support:
